title: Information Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Information domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name or title of the information management element

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the information management element entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the information management element within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the information management element

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the information management element is linked

inputs.description: The resources information or materials required for the information management element

outputs.description: The deliverables or results produced by the information management element

processes.description: The set of processes that define how the information management element operates

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the effectiveness and efficiency of the information management element

dependencies.description: Other elements processes or systems that the information management element depends on

relatedInformationElements.description: Information elements that are related or linked to this element

maturityLevel.description: The current maturity level of the information management element

toolsAndTechnologies.description: Tools and technologies used to support or enable the information management element

complianceAndStandards.description: Regulatory requirements and standards the information management element must adhere to

cost.description: The financial cost associated with implementing and maintaining the information management element

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the information management element and its operations

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the information management element can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the information management element aligns with the Organizations strategic goals and objectives

title.description: The name or title of the information component

description.description: A detailed explanation of the information component

purpose.description: The intended use or function of the information component

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for managing the information

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) using the information component

dataSources.description: The sources from which the information is collected

dataQuality.description: The quality measures and standards for the information component

security.description: The security measures applied to protect the information
